EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Summit – A Pivotal Thanks!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello! Thank you for visiting the Pivotal booth during the CF Summit. Here at Pivotal, we believe that Platform as a Service (PaaS) makes it much easier to deploy, run and scale applications and Cloud Foundry® is the industry’s leading Open PaaS and provides a choice of clouds, frameworks and application services. Pivotal CF <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf>®, the world’s leading enterprise PaaS powered by Cloud Foundry, has recently added new enterprise-grade capabilities:
- Ability to automatically deploy applications into dual availability zones to build in redundancy across clouds - Enhanced dashboards for real time application status, events, and logs - Ability for operations to create service plans for binding apps to existing enterprise data lakes - Developer data services for building next-gen apps
These capabilities support the speed and flexibility needed by application development teams, and the scalability, reliability, and control required by IT operations teams to deliver a new class of modern applications. Check us out at out GigaOM Structure <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/> in SF this week and see what Scott Yara <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/session/is-being-multi-cloud-even-possible/>, Pivotal’s President and Head of Products, has to say about PaaS <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/session/is-being-multi-cloud-even-possible/>. Thanks! The Pivotal Team
